name: Remember Him
description:
Made for Mini-Gamejam:

Disclaimer: Contains themes of depression and suicide. If you feel depressed or have suicidal thoughts, maybe don't play this game.

The game is currently very buggy, but I'm trying to fix as much as possible.

Remember him is a game about coping with the loss of a lost one. You must keep your depression levels low while navigating your life. 

Right now there has been very little bug testing since I have limited time and the game is very unstable in general. I'll try to fix this soon.

Music will be added when I receive it
